description: First up, Will Oremus, Senior Tech Writer for Slate, joins us for a preview of Tesla’s newest vehicle, “the D,” which is being unveiled at an event on Thursday. Plus, Buzzfeed’s Katie Notopoulos stops by to talk about installing teen-monitoring software on a stranger’s phone to spy on her digital life.
teaser: First up, Will Oremus, Senior Tech Writer for Slate, joins us for a preview of Tesla’s newest vehicle, “the D,” which is being unveiled at an event on Thursday. title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, October 6, 2014
